text: This is a list of noted or famous Danish painters. (The list is sorted by when they died; those who are alive, are farther down the list.) * Carl Bloch (d. 1890) * Camille Pissarro (d. 1903), Danish-French *Jens Adolf Jerichau (d. 1916) * Lili Elbe (d. 1931) * Carl-Henning Pedersen (d. 2007) * Arne Haugen SÃ¸rensen (1932-) ==References== Category:Danish painters Category:Lists of painters painter
title: List of Danish painters
